p: There was no abnormalities in the appearance of the spine and limbs. L4/5, L5/S1 spinous process gap tenderness is positive; limb sensation, muscle strength and muscle tension were all normal. Knee reflex: left/right = + +/−; ankle reflex: left/right = ++/+; pathological sign (−). Lasegue sign: left/right = −/+ (60°); Bragard sign: left/right = −/−; Femoral nerve tension test: left/right = -/-; Piriformis strain test: left/right = −/−.
